Inscription and Stamps

on back, in pencil: illegible inscription; [151.OG] and [G.]; on back in blue ink: [Type auo der Stammmappe (?)/ August Sander]; on back: two photographer\'s stamps; lower left corner, impressed in paper [AUG. SANDER / KÖHN / LINDENTHAL]
title: Farmer's Wife, Westerwald, Germany
